results.content: Good basic course on building an author website using Wordpress. Presenter is knowledgeable and personable. Bonus material on building a subscriber list contains great information.
results.content_html: Good basic course on building an author website using Wordpress. Presenter is knowledgeable and personable. Bonus material on building a subscriber list contains great information.

results.content: I found Tim's course at just the right time.  He leads the student through the steps involved in the creation of an author website.  Directions are clear and concise.  I felt like he was sitting down teaching me over a cup of coffee.  Comfortable, unintimidating presentation.  Well-done!  Thank you, Tim!
results.content_html: I found Tim's course at just the right time. He leads the student through the steps involved in the creation of an author website. Directions are clear and concise. I felt like he was sitting down teaching me over a cup of coffee. Comfortable, unintimidating presentation. Well-done! Thank you, Tim!

results.content: I would highly recommend this course to anyone without any prior knowledge on how to build a website fast, excellent course! Tim is a great teacher.
results.content_html: I would highly recommend this course to anyone without any prior knowledge on how to build a website fast, excellent course! Tim is a great teacher.

results.content: This is a good mechanical introduction to setting up your own author website. The instructor guides you to a couple of potential 'free' themes, his preferred hosting company, and provides a basic page structure for the kinds of pages you might like to have on your site such as Author Bio, Books, Events and so on. He also walks you through (in detail) how to modify each theme to achieve the result you want. I would have liked to have seen a module that looked at other themes - even paid ones, and maybe a module on plugins, but what he does show is adequate for the basics. Also, the author's persistent face in the lower right corner was distracting and unnecessary, but overall it's a nice hands-on, 'how to', beginners course for creating an author website from scratch.
results.content_html: This is a good mechanical introduction to setting up your own author website. The instructor guides you to a couple of potential 'free' themes, his preferred hosting company, and provides a basic page structure for the kinds of pages you might like to have on your site such as Author Bio, Books, Events and so on. He also walks you through (in detail) how to modify each theme to achieve the result you want. I would have liked to have seen a module that looked at other themes - even paid ones, and maybe a module on plugins, but what he does show is adequate for the basics. Also, the author's persistent face in the lower right corner was distracting and unnecessary, but overall it's a nice hands-on, 'how to', beginners course for creating an author website from scratch.

results.content: Not only did he explain how to use Wordpress, he showed how to make a uncluttered site, which is so important and difficult for authors.
results.content_html: Not only did he explain how to use Wordpress, he showed how to make a uncluttered site, which is so important and difficult for authors.

results.content: Tim, thank you very much for such a wonderful course. You're amazing. Good luck!:)

results.content: I am very familiar with WordPress, but though my tech "help" that writes code and I had no idea I could have been doing so much of it myself.  This makes perfect sense to me.  I could have saved so much money!  Now I know if I really do end up with an author website.  Thanks so much!  Very well done!
